precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop background.
action: Right Click on the desktop and click the menu item "Properties".

precondition: The desktop context menu is open and the "Properties" option is visible.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. The "Save As..." and "Delete" buttons will be replaced with "Settings" and "Preview" buttons, and a "Power..." button will appear at the bottom of the window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available screen saver options.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "3D FlowerBox" item in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Settings" button will become active, and the "Apply" button will become inactive.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu displays "(None)".
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Power..." button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu expanded.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" option will be set to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible.
